name: Tarogue
description: Tarogue is a twin-stick horde survival game with rogue-lite elements, inspired by Vampire Survivors, 20 Minutes til Dawn, and the Tarot. Choose your character, weapon, and battleground, then fight through hordes of horrors, unearthing secrets and picking upgrades to challenge a variety of powerful bosses. Whether you emerge victorious or succumb, you will earn rewards to become more powerful and unlock more characters, weapons, and locations.
